CUSTOMER.AGE:
Function DerivedValue(xmlNode) DerivedValue=""
If Not xmlNode.attributes.getNamedItem("DATEOFBIRTH") Is Nothing Then
dtDob=CDate(xmlNode.attributes.getNamedItem("DATEOFBIRTH").Text)
nDoB=(Year(dtDob) * 10000) + (Month(dtDob) * 100) + Day(dtDob)
nNow=(Year(Now) * 10000) + (Month(Now) * 100) + Day(Now)
DerivedValue=Fix((nNow - nDoB) / 10000)
End If End Function
